lyrics.text:
Tamai ‘i langi, motu atu,
‘Oku ke pule ‘a e peau:
Kuku he nima ē o’ou
Matangi mo e tahi hou;
Fanongo ‘emau tangi atu,
‘O tauhi ofi he folau.

‘E, Sīsū na’a ke mohe ma’u
He tomohopo he peau.
Hā’ele ‘i he moana,
Kouna ‘a e tahi hou ke na’a;
Fanongo ‘emau tangi atu,
‘O tauhi ofi he folau.

Si’i Tolu Tapu, tokanga’i
‘A e potu ‘oku nau ‘i ai.
Mu’aki atu ho’ fekau
Ki tahi, taufa, mo e hakau.
Kae fai ‘i tahi na mo ‘uta
‘A e fakamālō ‘o e ‘Otua.
